Hydras::

Hydras wait ready, for everything

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 11/24/03 10:00:39 PM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > the alarms rang showing that intruders are around the base, 
Hydras 
> > broke that magic moment and said "It's time to receive our guest 
> > Maxima, we should give them welcoem that they won't forget it..."
> 
> Snapping to... as the alarms ran out. 
> 
> > 
> > Hydras took his weapon and moved towards exit, while he motioned 
the 
> > femme do the same.
> > 
> > Soon he will be outside facing those intruders.
> > 
> > 
> > 
>  She followed him, her weapons at ready as she moved up beside 
him. Her 
> crimson optics glared at the intruders.
